metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3117 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Duplicate of CVE-2023-3390.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-155-generic - 5.4.0-155.172
linux-image-5.4.0-155-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-155.172
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-155-generic - 5.4.0-155.172
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-155-lowlatency - 5.4.0-155.172
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1106-aws - 5.4.0-1106.114
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1040-aws - 5.15.0-1040.45~20.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> seems like it is a duplicate for CVE-2023-3390. will likely be rejected.
